channel.title: silviu's blog
channel.description: A blog about programming and the pleasure of figuring things out. By Silviu Dan Cacoveanu.

item.title: Going Static Tutorial
item.description: I walk you through the steps of setting up a static blog on GitHub.

item.title: Going Static
item.description: Where I give you a short history of my blogs and make the case that taking a simpler approach to running your site may be the better option in the long run.

item.title: Asymmetric JWT
item.description: Authentication service implemented with JWT token signed with asymmetric key.

item.title: Wakey Wakey, PC
item.description: For those lazy Sunday mornings, when getting our of bed to wake up your media server seems excessive, but your laptop is within reach and writing a small program to send a Wake-On-LAN signal sounds so reasonable; it is in recognition of those mornings that I've put together this instructional page.

item.title: Distributed Akka Deployment
item.description: How to make a project scale seamlessly across machines, and share work, with Akka Cluster.

item.title: Spark Foreach Mongo Upsert Writer
item.description: Building several iterations of a generic upsert writer from a Spark stream to MongoDB.
